sentence.Network_en: Youre hungrier than ever and you cant seem to resist food.
sentence.Network_cn: 你比任何时候都感到饥饿,似乎抵挡不了食物的诱惑.

sentence.Network_en: Youre trying your best to not let yourself go cold, so cold.
sentence.Network_cn: 你尽了你的能力去不让你自己变成冷酷, 那样的冷.

sentence.Network_en: Youre going to send it by cable, arent you?
sentence.Network_cn: 您打算用电汇, 对 吗 ?

PerfectNetExp.abs: youre the island that i swim to ., 你就是那座等着我游过去的岛.
theyre easy to give when youre in love ., 它们在你陷入爱情的时候值得去付出.
but though youre still with me ., 虽然仍有你守在身边.
that youre the one i want to go ., 我愿共度时光之人.

list.abs: 在一层意义上，这仅仅是阿拉姆语一个常见的委婉说法，为了避免第一人称代词的过多重复，就像信结尾的"此致"（yours truly）。它 …
you want to know your name ? check your hat ., 你想知道你的名字吗看看你的帽子.
you need to change your eating habits ., 你得改变你的饮食习惯.
For the imperfect inside perfect . just... ... i am the only one 我是唯一。。。 in your 在你。。 for 为了.
